robot

Class NxtMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.NxtMotor

  • public class NxtMotor
extends Object
    Represents NXT's motors in the PC project

    Each operation sent to motors performed by NxtApplication thru NxtCommand

    See Also:
    NxtCommand, NxtApplication
